front.title: Registration of the Real-time-text Media Feature Tag

abstract.t: This memo defines a new Media Feature Tag "real-time-text" for use inSIP registration and session establishment. This is used to indicateif a device capable of text communication has full real-time textcapabilities or limitations in its capabilities requiring the usersto apply some turn-taking habits.To the RFC editorPlease replace y.y with the assigned ASN.1 identifier and XXXX withthe RFC number of this specification.
